ygData.subject: Re: stuck on luclin quest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Lots of quests in Shar Vahl.  You should check out the www.eqtraders.com site.  Most comprehensive information so far. Allakhazam can t keep up with all
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "stotty_k" <karen@s...> wrote:
> Hi hope that someone with SoL can help me out here.while having a
> stroll round Shar Val I hailed Merchant Ahlam, He gave me this
> quest.Merchant Ahlam says 'Ah good I was hoping you'd be along soon.I
> need you to collect some Gravel tea leaves from below the city. I

Lots of quests in Shar Vahl. You should check out the
www.eqtraders.com site. Most comprehensive information so far.
Allakhazam can't keep up with all the new stuff and since eqtraders is
set up for the tradeskills and nothing else it is ideal for looking up
Luclin quests.

Luclin is the best place to play if you like to do quests and
roleplay. I love the quests, lots of challenges and not as mindless
as just collecting stacks of things to get faction somewhere. All of
the quests build on themselves and I love that. Tho there is a
penalty if you loose all your stuff as a newbie, you gotta start over
if you loose your cloak cuz you need it to get better stuff.

Good luck and check out that site

Bebinn Maolcataig
25! Ranger Woodelf
Lindir
7 Bard Vah Shir

Bristlebane Server

I also have a BL Vah Shir I've played some so if you need help with
newbie BL quest just ask
